verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden דַּמָּ֑שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold דַמֶּ֙שֶׂק֙ <WH1834> Behold Damascus מוּסָ֣ר <WH5493> is taken away מֵעִ֔יר <WH5892> from [being] a city וְהָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> and will become מְעִ֥י <WH4596> heap מַפָּלָֽה׃ <WH4654> and it shall be a ruinous

עֲזֻב֖וֹת <WH5800> [are] forsaken עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> The cities עֲרֹעֵ֑ר <WH6177> of Aroer לַעֲדָרִ֣ים <WH5739> they shall be for flocks תִּֽהְיֶ֔ינָה <WH1961> become וְרָבְצ֖וּ <WH7257> which shall lie down וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> and none shall make [them] afraid

וְנִשְׁבַּ֤ת <WH7673> also shall cease מִבְצָר֙ <WH4013> The fortress מֵֽאֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> from Ephraim וּמַמְלָכָ֥ה <WH4467> and the kingdom מִדַּמֶּ֖שֶׂק <WH1834> from Damascus וּשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> and the remnant אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> of Syria כִּכְב֤וֹד <WH3519> they shall be as the glory בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel יִֽהְי֔וּ <WH1961> become נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts ס

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he יִדַּ֖ל <WH1809> shall be made thin כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> it shall come to pass [that] the glory יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob וּמִשְׁמַ֥ן <WH4924> and the fatness בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <WH1320> of his flesh יֵרָזֶֽה׃ <WH7329> shall wax lean

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> like כֶּֽאֱסֹף֙ <WH622> gathereth קָצִ֣יר <WH7105> And it shall be as when the harvestman קָמָ֔ה <WH7054> the corn וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> with his arm שִׁבֳּלִ֣ים <WH7641> the ears יִקְצ֑וֹר <WH7114> and reapeth וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become כִּמְלַקֵּ֥ט <WH3950> and it shall be as he that gathereth שִׁבֳּלִ֖ים <WH7641> ears בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> of Rephaim

וְנִשְׁאַר־ <WH7604> shall be left בּ֤וֹ עֽוֹלֵלֹת֙ <WH5955> Yet gleaning grapes כְּנֹ֣קֶף <WH5363> in it as the shaking זַ֔יִת <WH2132> of an olive tree שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> two שְׁלֹשָׁ֛ה <WH7969> [or] three גַּרְגְּרִ֖ים <WH1620> berries בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> in the top אָמִ֑יר <WH534> of the uppermost bough אַרְבָּעָ֣ה <WH702> four חֲמִשָּׁ֗ה <WH2568> [or] five בִּסְעִפֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5585> branches פֹּֽרִיָּ֔ה <WH6509> in the outmost fruitful נְאֻם־ <WH5002> thereof saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> At that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he יִשְׁעֶ֥ה <WH8159> look הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> shall a man עַל־ <WH5921> for עֹשֵׂ֑הוּ <WH6213> to his Maker וְעֵינָ֕יו <WH5869> and his eyes אֶל־ <WH413> to קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> to the Holy יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> One of Israel תִּרְאֶֽינָה׃ <WH7200> shall have respect

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִשְׁעֶ֔ה <WH8159> And he shall not look אֶל־ <WH413> for הַֽמִּזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> to the altars מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> the work יָדָ֑יו <WH3027> of his hands וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> have made אֶצְבְּעֹתָיו֙ <WH676> [that] which his fingers לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> neither shall respect וְהָאֲשֵׁרִ֖ים <WH842> either the groves וְהָחַמָּנִֽים׃ <WH2553> or the images

בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he יִהְי֣וּ ׀ <WH1961> become עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities מָעֻזּ֗וֹ <WH4581> shall his strong כַּעֲזוּבַ֤ת <WH5805> forsaken הַחֹ֙רֶשׁ֙ <WH2793> bough וְהָ֣אָמִ֔יר <WH534> and an uppermost branch אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָזְב֔וּ <WH5800> be as a forsaken מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> will be a שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <WH8077> and there shall be desolation

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שָׁכַ֙חַתְּ֙ <WH7911> Because thou hast forgotten אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׁעֵ֔ךְ <WH3468> of thy salvation וְצ֥וּר <WH6697> of the rock מָעֻזֵּ֖ךְ <WH4581> of thy strength לֹ֣א <WH3808> not זָכָ֑רְתְּ <WH2142> and hast not been mindful עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that תִּטְּעִי֙ <WH5193> therefore shalt thou plant נִטְעֵ֣י <WH5194> plants נַעֲמָנִ֔ים <WH5282> pleasant וּזְמֹ֥רַת <WH2156> slips זָ֖ר <WH2114> it with strange תִּזְרָעֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH2232> and shalt set

בְּי֤וֹם <WH3117> In the day נִטְעֵךְ֙ <WH5194> shalt thou make thy plant תְּשַׂגְשֵׂ֔גִי <WH7735> to grow וּבַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> and in the morning זַרְעֵ֣ךְ <WH2233> shalt thou make thy seed תַּפְרִ֑יחִי <WH6524> to flourish נֵ֥ד <WH5067> [shall be] a heap קָצִ֛יר <WH7105> [but] the harvest בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH2470> of grief וּכְאֵ֥ב <WH3511> sorrow אָנֽוּשׁ׃ <WH605> and of desperate ס

ה֗וֹי <WH1945> Woe הֲמוֹן֙ <WH1995> to the multitude עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> of many כַּהֲמ֥וֹת <WH1993> [which] make a noise יַמִּ֖ים <WH3220> of the seas יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <WH1993> like the noise וּשְׁא֣וֹן <WH7588> and to the rushing לְאֻמִּ֔ים <WH3816> of nations כִּשְׁא֛וֹן <WH7588> the rumbling מַ֥יִם <WH4325> waters כַּבִּירִ֖ים <WH3524> of mighty יִשָּׁאֽוּן׃ <WH7582> [that] make a rushing like the rushing

לְאֻמִּ֗ים <WH3816> The nations כִּשְׁא֞וֹן <WH7588> like the rushing מַ֤יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> of many יִשָּׁא֔וּן <WH7582> shall rush וְגָ֥עַר <WH1605> but [God] shall rebuke בּ֖וֹ וְנָ֣ס <WH5127> them and they shall flee מִמֶּרְחָ֑ק <WH4801> far off וְרֻדַּ֗ף <WH7291> and shall be chased כְּמֹ֤ץ <WH4671> as the chaff הָרִים֙ <WH2022> of the mountains לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> the wind וּכְגַלְגַּ֖ל <WH1534> and like a rolling thing לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before סוּפָֽה׃ <WH5492> the whirlwind

לְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> time עֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH6153> evening וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold בַלָּהָ֔ה <WH1091> trouble בְּטֶ֥רֶם <WH2962> Before בֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> [and] before the morning אֵינֶ֑נּוּ <WH369> are no זֶ֚ה <WH2088> Such חֵ֣לֶק <WH2506> he [is] not This [is] the portion שׁוֹסֵ֔ינוּ <WH8154> of them that spoil וְגוֹרָ֖ל <WH1486> us and the lot לְבֹזְזֵֽינוּ׃ <WH962> of them that rob ס
